messages.content: ComfyUI Clear Screen is an extension for ComfyUI that adds a CLS button to clear the console window.
What does the CLS button in ComfyUI Clear Screen do?
The CLS button in ComfyUI Clear Screen clears the console window when clicked.
Why would someone want to use ComfyUI Clear Screen?
ComfyUI Clear Screen is useful for benchmarking, extension developing, or when you just want to clear the console after it displays many errors.
Is ComfyUI Clear Screen an official part of ComfyUI?
No, ComfyUI Clear Screen is an extension for ComfyUI, not an official part of it.
Does ComfyUI Clear Screen add any other functionality besides clearing the console?
No, the sole purpose of ComfyUI Clear Screen is to add a CLS button that clears the console window.
Can ComfyUI Clear Screen be used for purposes other than clearing the console?
Yes, besides clearing the console, ComfyUI Clear Screen can also be useful for benchmarking and extension developing.
Is ComfyUI Clear Screen compatible with other ComfyUI extensions?
The provided information does not specify compatibility with other ComfyUI extensions.
